mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_booking_order (user_id, venue_id, booking_date, start_time, end_time, total_amount, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{venueId}, #{bookingDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{totalAmount}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT bo.*, v.name AS venueName, v.image_url AS venueImageUrl FROM t_booking_order bo LEFT JOIN t_venue v ON bo.venue_id = v.id WHERE bo.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY bo.create_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_booking_order WHERE venue_id = #{venueId} AND booking_date = #{bookingDate} AND status = 1 AND #{startTime} < end_time AND #{endTime} > start_time
